template.name: thread
kDeploymentFull
template.value: apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: $NAME$ labels: app: $NAME$ spec: replicas: 1 selector: matchLabels: app: $NAME$ template: metadata: name: $NAME$ labels: app: $NAME$ spec: containers: - name: $NAME$ image: $IMAGE$ imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent command: - /bin/ping - baidu.com ports: - containerPort: 8080 protocol: TCP - containerPort: 7979 protocol: UDP resources: requests: memory: "200Mi" cpu: "250m" limits: memory: "800Mi" cpu: "500m" env: - name: MYTEST value: MYTESTVALUE - name: MYSQL_DB_NAME valueFrom: configMapKeyRef: name: mysql-config key: db_name volumeMounts: - name: mysql-config mountPath: /etc/mysql/config/ - name: mysecret mountPath: /etc/mysql/secret/ - name: path mountPath: /test/ volumes: - name: path persistentVolumeClaim: claimName: ping-log - name: mysql-config configMap: name: mysql-config items: - key: my.cnf path: my.cnf - name: mysecret secret: secretName: mysecret items: - key: username path: my-username restartPolicy: Always

template.name: kSvcClusterIP
template.value: apiVersion: v1 kind: Service metadata: annotations: traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/affinity: "true" traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-method: drr traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/session-cookie-name: lb name: $NAME$ namespace: default spec: ports: - name: $NAME$ port: $PORT$ protocol: TCP targetPort: $PORT$ selector: app: $NAME$ type: ClusterIP

template.name: kIngress
template.value: apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1 kind: Ingress metadata: name: $NAME$ namespace: default spec: rules: - host: $NAME$.xxx.com http: paths: - backend: serviceName: $NAME$ servicePort: $PORT$ path: /

template.name: kConfigMapFull
template.value: apiVersion: v1 kind: ConfigMap metadata: name: $NAME$ namespace: default data: $KEY$: testdb my.cnf: | [mysqld] log-bin = mysql-bin app.properties: | property.1 = value-1 $END$

template.name: kSecret
template.value:
apiVersion: v1 kind: Secret metadata: name: $NAME$ type: Opaque data: username: YWRtaW4= password: MWYyZDFlMmU2N2Rm $END$
# $ echo -n 'admin' | base64 # YWRtaW4= # $ echo -n '1f2d1e2e67df' | base64 # $ echo -n 'YWRtaW4=' | base64 --decode # admin

template.name: kPVCNFS
template.value:
apiVersion: v1 kind: PersistentVolume metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: capacity: storage: $SPACE$Gi volumeMode: Filesystem accessModes: - ReadWriteOnce persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain storageClassName: slow mountOptions: - hard - nfsvers=4.1 nfs: path: /root/nfs/$NAME$ server: $NFSIP$ --- apiVersion: v1 kind: PersistentVolumeClaim metadata: name: $NAME$ namespace: default spec: accessModes: - ReadWriteOnce resources: requests: storage: $SPACE$Gi storageClassName: slow volumeName: $NAME$
##/root/nfs 10.1.107.0/24(rw,sync,no_root_squash,no_subtree_check)

template.name: kPVCHostPath
template.value:
apiVersion: v1 kind: PersistentVolume metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: accessModes: - ReadWriteOnce capacity: storage: $SPACE$Gi
hostPath: path: $PATH$ persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain storageClassName: hostpath --- apiVersion: v1 kind: PersistentVolumeClaim metadata: name: $NAME$ namespace: default spec: accessModes: - ReadWriteOnce resources: requests: storage: $SPACE$Gi storageClassName: hostpath volumeName: $NAME$
